de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.dimacs

Class DimacsReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.dimacs.DimacsReader

  • public class DimacsReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Transforms DIMACS CNF files into instances of Node.
    Author:
    Timo Günther, Sebastian Krieter

    • Method Detail

      • setReadingVariableDirectory

        public void setReadingVariableDirectory(boolean readVariableDirectory)

        Sets the reading variable directory flag. If true, the reader will look for a variable directory in the comments. This contains names for the variables which would otherwise just be numbers.

        Defaults to false.

        Parameters:
        readVariableDirectory - whether to read the variable directory

      • read

        @Nonnull
public Node read(java.io.Reader in)
                    throws java.text.ParseException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Reads the input.
        Parameters:
        in - The source to read from.
        Returns:
        a CNF; not null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the reader encounters a problem.
        java.text.ParseException - if the input does not conform to the DIMACS CNF file format

      • read

        @Nonnull
public Node read(java.lang.String in)
                    throws java.text.ParseException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Reads the input. Calls read(Reader).
        Parameters:
        in - The string to read from.
        Returns:
        a CNF; not null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the reader encounters a problem.
        java.text.ParseException - if the input does not conform to the DIMACS CNF file format
